create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_EDIT_REVENUEBYAPPEALCATEGORYCODEFORCAST ( @ID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @FORECASTSTRING nvarchar(max) , @FORECASTDETAILS xml ) as
set nocount on;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
begin try -- handle updating the data insert into dbo.debug (MESSAGE) VALUES (cast(@FORECASTDETAILS as nvarchar(max))); Declare @ITEMLISTXML xml select @ITEMLISTXML = cast(@FORECASTDETAILS as xml) if @ID is null set @ID = newid() insert into dbo.debug(MESSAGE) values (@FORECASTSTRING) if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
IF OBJECT_ID(N'tempdb..#FORECASTRESULTS') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #FORECASTRESULTS;
SELECT * INTO #FORECASTRESULTS FROM (
select T.c.value('(APPEALCATEGORYCODEID)[1]','uniqueidentifier') AS 'ID', T.c.value('(MONTHJAN)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHJAN', T.c.value('(MONTHFEB)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHFEB', T.c.value('(MONTHMAR)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHMAR', T.c.value('(MONTHAPR)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHAPR', T.c.value('(MONTHMAY)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHMAY', T.c.value('(MONTHJUN)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHJUN', T.c.value('(MONTHJUL)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHJUL', T.c.value('(MONTHAUG)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHAUG', T.c.value('(MONTHSEP)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHSEP', T.c.value('(MONTHOCT)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHOCT', T.c.value('(MONTHNOV)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHNOV', T.c.value('(MONTHDEC)[1]','nvarchar(255)') AS 'MONTHDEC' FROM @ITEMLISTXML.nodes('/FORECASTDETAILS/ITEM') T(c) WHERE T.c.value('(APPEALCATEGORYCODEID)[1]','uniqueidentifier') is not null -- Exclude totals ) ALLMONTHFORECAST
--SELECT * FROM #FORECASTRESULTS
Declare @FORCASTBYMONTH table (ID uniqueidentifier , MONTHID int, FORECASTAMOUNT money) -- Transform column to rows
insert into @FORCASTBYMONTH (ID, MONTHID, FORECASTAMOUNT) select ID,1, ISNULL(MONTHJAN,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,2, ISNULL(MONTHFEB,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,3, ISNULL(MONTHMAR,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,4, ISNULL(MONTHAPR,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,5, ISNULL(MONTHMAY,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,6, ISNULL(MONTHJUN,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,7, ISNULL(MONTHJUL,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,8, ISNULL(MONTHAUG,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,9, ISNULL(MONTHSEP,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,10,ISNULL(MONTHOCT,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,11,ISNULL(MONTHNOV,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS UNION select ID,12,ISNULL(MONTHDEC,0) from #FORECASTRESULTS delete from dbo.USR_REVENUECATEGORYBYAPPEALCODEFORECAST WHERE GLFISCALYEARID = @ID insert into dbo.USR_REVENUECATEGORYBYAPPEALCODEFORECAST (GLFISCALYEARID,APPEALCATEGORYCODEID, MONTHID, EXPECTEDTOTALGIFTAMOUNT, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED) select @ID as FISCALYEAR , ID as APPEALCATEGORYCODEID , MONTHID as MONTHID , FORECASTAMOUNT as FORECASTAMOUNT , @CHANGEAGENTID as ADDEDBYID , @CHANGEAGENTID as CHANGEDBYID , @CURRENTDATE as DATEADDED , @CURRENTDATE as DATECHANGED FROM @FORCASTBYMONTH end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0;
